streamlabs_token.label: Streamlabs Socket Token
streamlabs_token.tooltip: The Streamlabs Socket Token. This can be found on the website via the left-hand side menu -> API Settings -> API Tokens.

apisetting_button.label: Get your Socket Token here
apisetting_button.tooltip: Click here to go to the Streamlabs API settings page

twitch_clientid.label: Twitch Client-ID
twitch_clientid.tooltip: The Twitch CLIENT-ID. Register an application and use the Client-ID here.

twitchapi_button.label: Get your Twitch Client ID Here
twitchapi_button.tooltip: Click here to register for your Twitch Client-ID

MessageTemplate.value: Fellow 2BIT Community streamer @$display_name has $action the channel. Make sure you go give them a follow https://twitch.tv/$name
MessageTemplate.label: Message Template
MessageTemplate.tooltip:
$name = hosting channel name
$display_name = hosting user display name
$action = The event action: hosted or raided
